summary: While divorced and bickering grandparents watch their grandchildren, a lab experiment gone awry transforms the elders into teenagers again.
cast: Tia Mowry-Hardrict|Tamera Mowry-Housley|Mark Taylor|Tahj Mowry|Hope Clarke|Robert Hooks|Merwin Mondesir|Phillip Jarrett|Tonya Williams|Maia Campbell|Daryn Jones|K.C. Liddell|Jeff Wong|Tina Atkins|Vanessa Cobham|Peter Radcliffe|Boyz II Men
title: De vuelta a los 17
